name: graphql-relay-connection
description: A GraphQL Relay connection with cursor based on id, not on number offset. Can be used for MongoDB.

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run test-build && npm run test
scripts.watch: npm run build-watch & npm run test-build-watch & npm run test-watch
scripts.update-D: npm install --save-dev babel-cli@latest babel-plugin-transform-flow-strip-types@latest babel-preset-es2015@latest babel-preset-stage-0@latest chai@latest chai-as-promised@latest mocha@latest

author: Joon Ho Cho
